product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 3 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Built for 3 people (or 2 and a dog), the freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 3 Tent provides a comfortable, reliable campground setup. Shockcorded fiberglass poles are one size larger than normal for strength and sturdiness. Polyester taffeta body and fly are lightweight yet long-lasting. Walls have been left uncoated so the tent can breathe under the urethane-coated fly, which reduces condensation buildup. Center fly pole creates an awning over each door; full-coverage rainfly ensures excellent rain protection. Factory-sealed seams on the floor and fly increase water repellency. 2 doors allow easy entry and exit, so you don't have to crawl over others to get in and out. Second door also aids cross-ventilation in hot weather. Mesh storage pockets and gear loft keep small items organized. Stakes and guylines are included with the ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 3 Tent. Special buy.
short_description: Built for 3 people (or 2 and a dog), the freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 3 Tent provides a comfortable, reliable campground setup.
